message.content: Created a comprehensive contact page with a user-friendly layout featuring a contact form, location map, and business information. The page maintains consistent navigation and footer elements while providing multiple ways for customers to reach DoughHeaven, including a direct message form, physical address, phone number, and email address.
pada hero section Get in Touch berikan gambar sebagai backgound

Enhanced the hero section with an attractive background image that creates a warm, inviting atmosphere for the contact page. The image complements the "Get in Touch" heading and adds visual appeal to engage visitors immediately upon landing on the page.
message.description: Added background image to hero section

message.content:
style hero section seperti style hero section pada halaman menu atau story, tapi content atau isinya **Get in Touch**

We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a question, feedback, or want to place a special order.

Updated the hero section to match the style from the menu and story pages while maintaining the "Get in Touch" content. The improved design creates visual consistency across the website with an elegant background and proper text styling.
message.description: Updated hero section to match style from menu and story pages

message.content: Enhanced the hero section with a beautiful background image that creates visual impact while maintaining the "Get in Touch" messaging. The overlay adds contrast to make the text more readable, creating a consistent look with other pages while highlighting the contact page's purpose.
message.description: Updated hero section with background image and overlay

message.content: Converted all content to English throughout the contact page. The page now presents a cohesive English-language experience with proper grammar and terminology for all contact information, form elements, and descriptive text.
message.description: Fixed hero section structure by removing an extra closing div tag
